channel.title: Update Client GameFrame (Help!)
channel.description:
How can I go about updating to the 525 gameframe for my client? This is my base for my server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,480500.0.html
I know it is possible because this guy did it and he has the same base as me - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,486973.msg3569089.html#msg3569089
I am starting a new server and have a site and dedi waiting so I am on a bit of a schedule and I need to get this fixed asap. If anybody knows of a client compatible with that base with the new gameframe or give advice for updating it myself I would greatly appreciate it and certainly repay you in anyway I can! I can use all the help I can get.
